dcterms:description: A class-incremental dataset constructed from the AVE dataset, consisting of 4K 10-seconds videos from 28 audio-visual event classes, split into 4 incremental tasks.
dcterms:title: AVE-Class-Incremental (AVE-CI)

dcterms:creator: Will Kay
Joao Carreira
Karen Simonyan
Brian Zhang
Chloe Hillier
Sudheendra Vijayanarasimhan
Fabio Viola
Tim Green
Trevor Back
Paul Natsev
dcterms:description: A class-incremental dataset constructed from the Kinetics-Sounds dataset, containing around 24K 10-seconds videos from 31 human action classes, divided into 5 incremental steps.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-Sounds-Class-Incremental (K-S-CI)

dcterms:creator: Honglie Chen
Weidi Xie
Andrea Vedaldi
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: A class-incremental dataset constructed from the VGGSound dataset, containing around 200K 10-seconds videos from 309 classes, randomly divided into 10 incremental steps.
dcterms:title: VGGSound100-Class-Incremental (VS100-CI)
